actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 94-653.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

summary.text: Authorizes the expenditure of $330,000 by the Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry for inquiries and investigations from March 1, 1976, through February 28, 1977. Allocates $12,455 to be expended for the procurement of the services of consultants. Requires the committee to report its findings and recommendations for legislation to the Senate no later than February 28, 1977.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.
